content.text:
# Jarwar

Jarwar () is a sub-tribe from the Gazini branch of Marri Baloch.
Tribal Territories
Many families of Jarwar still live in their native place near Kahan, Balochistan but they are now mainly split into various groups and living in various regions of Balochistan, Sindh and South Punjab provinces of Pakistan, Afghanistan and Iran.
See also
*Marri-Bugti country
*Marri Baloch
